mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO oms_smr_recordinfo ( ID, B0100, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, ID_CARD_NUMBER, NATION, A0141, POST, SECRET_RELATED_POST, SECRET_RELATED_LEVEL, SECRET_REVIEW_DATE, START_DATE, FINISH_DATE, IMPORT_USER_ID, IMPORT_DATE, IMPORT_YEAR, IS_MATCHING ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.b0100}, #{item.name}, #{item.sex}, #{item.birthDay}, #{item.idCardNumber}, #{item.nation}, #{item.a0141}, #{item.post}, #{item.secretRelatedPost}, #{item.secretRelatedLevel}, #{item.secretReviewDate}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.finishDate}, #{item.importUserId}, #{item.importDate}, #{item.importYear}, #{item.isMatching} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, p.PERSON_STATE FROM oms_smr_recordinfo t LEFT JOIN oms_smr_personinfo p ON t.ID_CARD_NUMBER = p.ID_CARD_NUMBER WHERE t.IS_MATCHING != '1'
